description:
Thank you fro visiting First landing page with django.

In this lesson, You can learn how to use Mac terminal. If you want to create web site or web application, sometimes you have to use terminal. In this lesson, we will teach basic important commands of terminal.

After you learn basic commands of terminal, let's try to make your first landing page with django and Python. You can learn about templates and bootstrap. Moreover, you can learn how to put an image and a button on the landing page. Take it easy!

<OUTLINE --MAC TERMINAL -- >

  • What is terminal ?
  • ls and cd command
  • mkdir command
  • mv command
  • touch and rm, rmdir command

<OUTLINE -- Python -- >

  • What is Python?
  • Print method
  • variable and string
  • while syntax
  • for syntax
  • list
  • conditional judgment with if syntax
  • conditional judgment by strings

<OUTLINE -- create first landing page with django -- >

  • create a project
  • Sublime Text2
  • root settings
  • admin page
  • creating views.py
  • Bootstrap
  • Button and Link
  • Grid system and images
  • h tag
title: First landing page with django
